scripts.develop:deploy: vue-cli-service build --mode develop; firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-assessments-app --project digital-platform-develop
scripts.staging:deploy: vue-cli-service build --mode staging; firebase deploy --only hosting:staging-assessments-app --project digital-platform-staging
scripts.production:deploy: vue-cli-service build --mode production; firebase deploy --only hosting:production-assessments-app --project platform-production-9207d
scripts.develop:deploy-service-offline: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html; firebase deploy --only hosting:develop-assessments-app -P develop
scripts.staging:deploy-service-offline: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html; firebase deploy --only hosting:staging-assessments-app -P staging
scripts.production:deploy-service-offline: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; cp service-offline/index.html dist/index.html; firebase deploy --only hosting:production-assessments-app -P production
scripts.test: echo No tests configured in this project
scripts.test-ci: echo No tests configured in this project
